issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: Client.java can get "Address already in use" when using kerberos and attempting to bind to any port on the local IP address.  It appears to be caused by the host running out of ports in the ephemeral range.
fields.summary: Use SO_REUSEADDR to avoid getting "Address already in use" when using kerberos and attempting to bind to any port on the local IP address
